{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Gateworks Avila GW2348-4.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Network Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.gateworks.com/product/item/avila-gw2348-4-network-processor |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |fandom = <!-- infodepot.fandom page, included underscores --> |wikidevi = Gateworks_Avila_GW2348-4 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = activation |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Gateworks |model = Avila GW2348 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -4 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 07/29/2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Gateworks_Avila_GW2348-4 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel XScale;IXP425A;EWIXP425ABDT, L7465165, (M)(C)'06, Z745LB60AB, 746 TAIWAN; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = XScale |cpu1spd = 533 <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;JS28F128J3D75; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Micron;MT48LC16M16A2; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Cortina Systems;LXT973;Cortina Systems, LXT973; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:D0:12
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RedBoot;2.04.1;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI, CompactFlash |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = 4 |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = 9-48 |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, DE-9 |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup, hardware watchdog, temp. and volt. sensor |addchip = 3V RS232 Transceiver;Texas Instruments;MB3232I;;2;,,, Serial EEPROM (8 Kbit);Atmel;AT24C08AN;;1;,,, 60V N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS5670;;4;,,, Synchronous Step-Down Controller;Linear Technology;LT3800EFE;;1;,,, Low Voltage Regulator;Sipex;SPX29152T5;;1;,,, 33.33 Mhz SMD Crystal Oscillator;Suntsu Frequency Control;SOCB48-33.333;;1;,,, 25 Mhz SMD Crystal Oscillator;Suntsu Frequency Control;SOCB48-25.000;;1;,,, 3.3 V zero delay 3.3V Zero Delay Buffer;Cypress;CY2309ZXI;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== '''Operating current''': 0.20A Typical @ 24VDC, optionally has two USB ports
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/shop/catalog/product_info.php?manufacturers_id=&products_id=59 Product page in the DD-WRT store] *[http://trac.gateworks.com/wiki/avila_build_openwrt ''avila_build_openwrt'' on '''Gateworks'''' Wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Avila_Gateworks_GW234x ''GW234x series'' page on the '''DD-WRT''' Wiki] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/openwrtdocs/hardware/gateworks/avila_gw2348_4 ''GW2348-4'' on the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki (old)] {{OpenWrtTechData|https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/gateworks/gateworks_avilagw2348-4}}
